name: Inspiration
description:
Made in 3 days for the "Mini Jam 62: Colors"

Mini jam is a 72-hour-long, game development jam for independent game developers that occurs every two weeks.

The Game:

Play as a painter looking to regain his artistic inspiration. Solve puzzles by painting the levels in such a way that will help you get to the exit!

How To Play:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Jump

Scroll Wheel - Change Brush Color

Click - Paint / Clear Paint

Click on a non-white platform to remove its paint.  Once you have removed its paint you can place it on another platform. Different colors give you different effects, use them all to get to the end of the level!
